get.description: Get recent media from a geography subscription that you created. Note: You can only access Geographies that were explicitly created by your OAuth client. Check the Geography Subscriptions section of the real-time updates page. When you create a subscription to some geography that you define, you will be returned a unique geo-id that can be used in this query. To backfill photos from the location covered by this geography, use the media search endpoint.n                n            nn            n            n                Parametersn                n                    n                    n                        countn                        Max number of media to return.n                    n                    n                    n                        min_idn                        Return media before this min_id.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max number of media to return.
